description: M/s. Minakshi Agro Industries LLP has already obtained Environmental Clearance in the name of Minakshi from Morya vide EC Identification No. SIA/MH/IND2/500860/2025; dated 24.10.2025. The industry is presently operating an existing 40 KLPD Grain Based Distillery (equivalent to 14,600 KLPA).
